mapper.select: SELECT am.id AS id, am.create_time AS createTime, am.update_time AS updateTime, am.name AS name, am.title AS title, am.icon AS icon, am.path AS path, am.component AS component, am.parent AS parent, am.permission AS permission, am.sort AS sort, am.menu_type AS menuType, am.el_svg_icon AS elSvgIcon, am.route_name AS routeName, am.query AS query, am.redirect AS redirect from admin_role_menu arm left join admin_menu am on am.id = arm.menu_id where arm.role_id = #{roleId}
